org.cse.client.bkm
Interface BookmarkProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
Delicious
public interface BookmarkProvider

Interface of any service capable of providing with bookmark and tag information

Author:
KBac

Method Detail

getName

String getName()
Returns:
name of the provider implementation

getSmallImageHtml

String getSmallImageHtml()
Returns:

fetchTags

void fetchTags(String uid,
               String pwd,
               AbstractResponseTextHandler handler)
Call this method to retrieve tags from the instance of the TagProvider

Parameters:
uid - to whom the tags belong
pwd - (optional)
handler - which is an extension of AbstractResponseTextHandler responsible for initiating the request and processing the response

NB: Provider is responsible for assigning the relevant parser to the handler.

fetchBookmarks

void fetchBookmarks(String uid,
                    List includedTags,
                    List excludedTags,
                    AbstractResponseTextHandler handler)
Call this method to retrieve bookmarks from the instance of the TagProvider

Parameters:
uid - to whom the bookmarks belong
includedTags - List<Tag> bookmarks should be tagged with
excludedTags - List<Tag> bookmarks should not be tagged with
handler - which is an extension of AbstractResponseTextHandler responsible for initiating the request and processing the response

NB: Provider is responsible for assigning the relevant parser to the handler.
